it-fullscreen":"Quitter\x20le\x20mode\x20plein\x20\u00E9cran","ce-post-recommend-head":"Envie\x20de\x20regarder\x20autre\x20chose\u00A0\x3F","ce-post-recommend-body":"Voici\x20quelques\x20id\u00E9es\x20de\x20programmes...","ce-post-recommend-singular":"Voici\x20une\x20suggestion\x20qui\x20devrait\x20vous\x20plaire...","ce-post-more-info":"Plus\x20d\x27infos","ce-post-autoplay-prepromo-trailer-plural":"Regardez\x20la\x20bande-annonce\x20dans\x20\x3Cspan\x3E{SECONDS}\x20secondes\x3C\x2Fspan\x3E","ce-post-autoplay-prepromo-trailer-singular":"Regardez\x20la\x20bande-annonce\x20dans\x20\x3Cspan\x3E1\u00A0seconde\x3C\x2Fspan\x3E","ce-post-play-trailer":"Regarder\x20la\x20bande-annonce","ce-post-play-promo-episode":"Regarder\x20S{SEASON}:E{EPISODE}","ce-post-play-promo-episode-abr":"Regarder\x20{SEASON_ABR}:E{EPISODE}","ce-post-play-promo-title":"Lecture","ce-post-save-to-my-list":"Enregistrer\x20dans\x20Ma\x20liste","ce-post-add-to-my-list":"\x2B\x20Ma\x20liste","ce-post-remove-to-my-list":"\u2713\x20Ma\x20liste","ce-post-replay-trailer":"Revoir\x20la\x20bande-annonce","ce-post-original-promote-header":"La\x20bande-annonce\x20vous\x20a\x20plu\u00A0\x3F","ce-post-original-promote-text":"Vous\x20allez\x20adorer\x20le\x20premier\x20\u00E9pisode...","ce-post-rate":"\u00C9valuer\u00A0:","ce-post-no-autoplay":"Cliquez\x20pour\x20regarder\x20l\x27\u00E9pisode\x20suivant","ce-show-member-type-season":"Saison\x20{SEQ}","ce-show-member-type-season-proper":"{SEASON_LABEL}","ce-show-member-type-series":"Saison\x20{SEQ}","ce-show-member-type-book":"Volume\x20{SEQ}","ce-show-member-type-chapter":"Chapitre\x20{SEQ}","ce-show-member-type-collection":"Collection\x20{SEQ}","ce-show-member-type-part":"Partie\x20{SEQ}","ce-show-member-type-set":"Coffret\x20{SEQ}","ce-show-member-type-volume":"Volume\x20{SEQ}","ce-nsre-time-info":"{AVAILABILITY}\x20\x7C\x20{DURATION}","ce-teaser-auto-play":"Aper\u00E7u\x20dans\x20\x3Cspan\x3E{sec}\x20secondes\x3C\x2Fspan\x3E","ce-teaser-auto-play-singular":"A \x20Internet\x20et\x20r\u00E9essayer.\x3Cbr\x3E\x3Cbr\x3ESi\x20le\x20probl\u00E8me\x20persiste,\x20veuillez\x20consulter\x20le\x20\x3Ca\x20href\x3D\"https:\x2F\x2Fhelp.netflix.com\x2F\"\x3ECentre\x20d\x27aide\x20de\x20Netflix\x3C\x2Fa\x3E.","ce-text-internet_connection_problem":"Un\x20probl\u00E8me\x20de\x20connexion\x20Internet\x20ou\x20r\u00E9seau\x20emp\u00EAche\x20la\x20lecture.\x20Veuillez\x20v\u00E9rifier\x20votre\x20connexion\x20Internet\x20et\x20r\u00E9essayer.","ce-head-should_signout_and_signin":"Probl\u00E8me\x20d\x27identification\x20\u00E0\x20Netflix","ce-text-should_signout_and_signin":"Pour\x20r\u00E9soudre\x20ce\x20probl\u00E8me,\x20essayez\x20de\x20vous\x20d\u00E9connecter\x20du\x20site\x20Netflix,\x20puis\x20de\x20vous\x20identifier\x20\u00E0\x20nouveau.\x3Cbr\x3E\x3Cbr\x3E\x3Ca\x20href\x3D\"{SIGNOUT_URL}\"\x20target\x3D\"_top\"\x3ESe\x20d\u00E9connecter\x3C\x2Fa\x3E","ce-head-multiple_tabs":"Onglets\x20Netflix\x20multiples","ce-text-multiple_tabs":"Vous\x20regardez\x20Netflix\x20sur\x20plus\x20d\x27un\x20navigateur\x20ou\x20onglet\x20\u00E0\x20la\x20fois.\x20Veuillez\x20fermer\x20les\x20autres\x20onglets\x20ou\x20navigateurs,\x20puis\x20recharger\x20la\x20page.\x3Cbr\x3E\x3Cbr\x3ESi\x20cette\x20erreur\x20persiste,\x20vous\x20devrez\x20peut-\u00EAtre\x20red\u00E9marrer\x20votre\x20ordinateur.","ce-head-storage_quota":"Erreur\x20de\x20stockage","ce-head-plugin_error":"Le\x20lecteur\x20vid\u00E9o\x20de\x20Netflix\x20n\x27est\x20pas\x20disponible","ce-text-please_call-phone":"Une\x20erreur\x20inattendue\x20est\x20survenue.\x20Veuillez\x20recharger\x20la\x20page\x20et\x20r\u00E9essayer.\x20Si\x20le\x20probl\u00E8me\x20persiste,\x20veuillez\x20consulter\x20le\x20\x3Ca\x20href\x3D\"https:\x2F\x2Fhelp.netflix.com\x2F\"\x3ECentre\x20d\x27aide\x20de\x20Netflix\x3C\x2Fa\x3E.","ce-text-please_call":"Une\x20erreur\x20inattendue\x20est\x20survenue.\x20Veuillez\x20recharger\x20la\x20page\x20et\x20r\u00E9essayer.\x20Si\x20le\x20probl\u00E8me\x20persiste,\x20veuillez\x20consulter\x20le\x20\x3Ca\x20href\x3D\"https:\x2F\x2Fhelp.netflix.com\x2F\"\x3ECentre\x20d\x27aide\x20de\x20Netflix\x3C\x2Fa\x3E.","ce-head-should_upgrade":"Mettez\x20\u00E0\x20jour\x20votre\x20navigateur","ce-head-device_needs_service":"Erreur\x20de\x20lecture\x20vid\u00E9o","ce-error-dialog-button-ok":"OK","ce-head-geo":"Proxy\x20d\u00E9tect\u00E9","ce-text-geo":"Il\x20semble\x20que\x20vous\x20utilisiez\x20un\x20proxy\x20ou\x20un\x20d\u00E9bloqueur.\x20Veuillez\x20d\u00E9sactiver\x20ces\x20services\x20et\x20r\u00E9essayer.\x20Si\x20vous\x20avez\x20besoin\x20d\x27aide,\x20rendez-vous\x20sur\x20\x3Ca\x20href\x3D\"http:\x2F\x2Fwww.netflix.com\x2Fproxy\"\x20target\x3D\"_blank\"\x3Enetflix.com\x2Fproxy\x3C\x2Fa\x3E","ce-head-sorry":"D\u00E9sol\u00E9\x20pour\x20cette\x20interruption.","ce-text-session-expired":"Votre\x20session\x20Netflix\x20a\x20expir\u00E9.\x20Veuillez\x20vous\x20d\u00E9connecter\x20et\x20vous\x20identifier\x20\u00E0\x20nouveau\x20pour\x20regarder\x20ce\x20titre.","ce-sign-out-button":"SE\x20D\u00C9CONNECTER","ce-incognito-private-menu":"Lecture\x20en\x20mode\x20priv\u00E9","ce-incognito-private-on":"Oui","ce-incognito-private-off":"D\u00E9sactiv\u00E9","ce-incognito-anonymous-menu":"Lecture\x20anonyme","ce-incognito-anonymous-on":"Activ\u00E9","ce-incognito-anonymous-off":"D\u00E9sactiv\u00E9","ce-incognito-history-menu":"Historique\x20de\x20lecture","ce-incognito-history-save":"Ajouter\x20\u00E0\x20l\x27historique","ce-incognito-history-hide":"Masquer\x20de\x20l\x27historique","ce-incognito-api-error-title":"La\x20lecture\x20en\x20mode\x20priv\u00E9\x20n\x27est\x20pas\x20disponible.","ce-incognito-api-error-text":"Veuillez\x20r\u00E9essayer\x20plus\x20tard.","ce-report-problem-menu":"Un\x20probl\u00E8me\x20est\x20survenu\u00A0\x3F\x20Dites-nous.","ce-report-problem-title":"Que\x20se\x20passe-t-il\u00A0\x3F","ce-report-problem-subtext":"S\u00E9lectionnez\x20toutes\x20les\x20r\u00E9ponses\x20appropri\u00E9es.","ce-report-problem-label-problem-ti d.","ce-social-error":"D\u00E9sol\u00E9,\x20une\x20erreur\x20s\x27est\x20produite.\x20Veuillez\x20r\u00E9essayer\x20plus\x20tard.","what-did-you-think":"Qu\x27avez-vous\x20pens\u00E9\x20de\x20{title}\u00A0\x3F","what-did-you-think-episodic":"Qu\x27avez-vous\x20pens\u00E9\x20de\x20l\x27\u00E9pisode\u00A0{number}\u00A0\x3F","dolby-digital":"{LANG}\x20\x285.1\x29","ce-button-alt-play":"Lecture","ce-button-alt-pause":"Pause","ce-button-alt-dontshare":"Ne\x20pas\x20partager","ce-button-alt-episodes":"\u00C9pisodes","ce-button-alt-show-more-episodes":"Afficher\x20plus\x20d\x27\u00E9pisodes","ce-button-alt-show-previous-episodes":"Afficher\x20les\x20\u00E9pisodes\x20pr\u00E9c\u00E9dents","ce-button-alt-exit-fullscreen":"Quitter\x20le\x20mode\x20plein\x20\u00E9cran","ce-button-alt-hide-episodes":"Masquer\x20les\x20\u00E9pisodes","ce-button-alt-go-fullscreen":"Passer\x20en\x20plein\x20\u00E9cran","ce-button-alt-incognito":"Lecture\x20en\x20mode\x20priv\u00E9","ce-button-alt-mdx":"Chromecast","ce-button-alt-next-episode":"\u00C9p.\x20suivant","ce-button-alt-subtitles":"Audio\x20et\x20sous-titres","ce-button-alt-volume":"Volume","ce-button-alt-mute":"D\u00E9sactiver\x20le\x20son","ce-button-alt-slider":"{PERCENTAGE}\u00A0\x25\x20de\x20progression","ce-button-alt-season-selector":"S\u00E9lectionner\x20la\x20saison","ce-button-alt-play-sim":"Regarder\x20{TITLE_NAME}","ce-congested-network-title":"Votre\x20connexion\x20\u00E0\x20Netflix\x20via\x20{NETWORK}\x20semble\x20encombr\u00E9e.","ce-congested-network-text":"R\u00E9glage\x20de\x20la\x20vid\u00E9o\x20pour\x20une\x20lecture\x20plus\x20fluide."},"discovery\x2Fakira\x2FChrome-8960-2":{"header.exitkids":"Quitter\x20la\x20section\x20Jeunesse","header.kids":"Jeunesse","navitem.kids":"Jeunesse","navitem.kids.caps":"JEUNESSE"},"discovery\x2Fakira\x2FChrome-8960-3":{"header.exitkids":"Quitter\x20la\x20section\x20Enfants","header.kids":"Enfants","navitem.kids":"Enfants","navitem.kids.caps":"ENFANTS"},"discovery\x2Fakira\x2FNotificatio 00E9e\x20par\x20votre\x20navigateur\x20configur\u00E9\x20pour\x20Ex\u00E9cuter\x20en\x20tant\x20qu\x27administrateur.\x20Fermez\x20votre\x20navigateur\x20et\x20relancez-le\x20sans\x20choisir\x20l\x27option\x20Ex\u00E9cuter\x20en\x20tant\x20qu\x27administrateur.\x20Pour\x20plus\x20d\x27informations,\x20veuillez\x20consulter\x20l\x27URL\x20\x3Ca\x20href\x3D\"\x2F\x2Fhelp.netflix.com\x2Fen\x2Fnode\x2F12387\"\x3Ehttps:\x2F\x2Fhelp.netflix.com\x2Fen\x2Fnode\x2F12387\x3C\x2Fa\x3E.","ce-head-private_mode":"Erreur\x20mode\x20de\x20navigation\x20priv\u00E9e","ce-text-private_mode":"Il\x20semble\x20que\x20votre\x20navigateur\x20soit\x20en\x20mode\x20navigation\x20priv\u00E9e.\x3Cbr\x3E\x3Cbr\x3EVeuillez\x20d\u00E9sactiver\x20ce\x20mode\x20et\x20r\u00E9essayer."},"discovery\x2Fakira\x2FBVUIChromeOS":{"ce-text-storage_quota":"Le\x20lecteur\x20vid\u00E9o\x20de\x20Netflix\x20exige\x20un\x20stockage\x20sur\x20votre\x20Chromebook.\x3Cbr\x3E\x3Cbr\x3EVeuillez\x20recharger\x20\u00E0\x20partir\x20d\x27une\x20fen\u00EAtre\x20de\x20navigation\x20non\x20priv\u00E9e\x20et\x20permettre\x20\u00E0\x20Netflix\x20de\x20stocker\x20des\x20donn\u00E9es\x20sur\x20votre\x20Chromebook\x20pour\x20activer\x20la\x20lecture.","ce-text-no_cdm":"Impossible\x20de\x20localiser\x20tous\x20les\x20composants\x20n\u00E9cessaires\x20pour\x20lancer\x20Netflix\x20sur\x20cet\x20appareil.\x20Rendez-vous\x20sur\x20chrome:\x2F\x2Fplugins\x20et\x20assurez-vous\x20que\x20les\x20plug-ins\x20\"Netflix\"\x20et\x20\"Widevine\x20Content\x20Decryption\x20Module\"\x20sont\x20activ\u00E9s\x20et\x20que\x20le\x20param\u00E8tre\x20\"Toujours\x20autoris\u00E9\"\x20est\x20coch\u00E9.","ce-text-should_upgrade":"Votre\x20version\x20de\x20Chrome\x20\x28{CHROME_VERSION}\x29\x20requiert\x20une\x20mise\x20\u00E0\x20jour.\x20Veuillez\x20consulter\x20les\x20instructions\x20\x3Ca\x20href\x3D\"https:\x2F\x2Fsupport.google.com\x2Fchrome\x2Fanswer\x2F95414\"\x3Eici\x3C\x2Fa\x3E.\x20Une\x20fois\x20celle-ci\x20effectu\u00E9e,\x20veuillez\x20relancer\x20la\x20lecture."},"discovery\x2Fakira\x2FBVUISafari":{"ce-text-storage_quota":"Le\x20mode\x20de\x20navigation\x20priv\u00E9e\x20de\x20Safari\x20emp\u00EAche\x20Netflix\x20de\x20stocker\x20des\x20param\u00E8tres\x20sur\x20votre\x20ordinateur.\x3Cbr\x3E\x3Cbr\x3EPour\x20d\u00E9sactiver\x20la\x20navigation\x20priv\u00E9e,\x20cliquez\x20sur\x20le\x20menu\x20Safari\x20dans\x20le\x20coin\x20sup\u00E9rieur\x20gauche\x20de\x20l\x27\u00E9cran\x20et\x20d\u00E9cochez\x20Navigation\x20priv\u00E9e.","ce-text-plugin_error":"Veuillez\x20nous\x20excuser,\x20nous\x20ne\x20trouvons\x20pas\x20les\x20bons\x20composants\x20pour\x20visionner\x20Netflix.\x3Cbr\x3E\x3Cbr\x3EVeuillez\x20vous\x20assurer\x20que\x20votre\x20version\x20de\x20Safari\x20est\x20la\x20plus\x20r\u00E9cente.","ce-head-no_cdm":"Erreur\x20de\x20lecture","ce-text-no_cdm":"Il\x20semble\x20qu\x27un\x20probl\u00E8me\x20avec\x20Safari\x20emp\u00EAche\x20Netflix\x20de\x20lancer\x20la\x20lecture.\x3Cbr\x3E\x3Cbr\x3EVeuillez\x20v\u00E9rifier\x20que\x20les\x20derni\u00E8res\x20mises\x20\u00E0\x20jour\x20logicielles\x20sont\x20install\u00E9es\x20sur\x20votre\x20ordinateur.","ce-text-should_upgrade":"Votre\x20version\x20de\x20Safari\x20requiert\x20une\x20mise\x20\u00E0\x20jour.\x20Une\x20fois\x20celle-ci\x20effectu\u00E9e,\x20veuillez\x20relancer\x20la\x20lecture.","ce-head-unsupported_output":"Erreur\x20d\x27affichage","ce-text-unsupported_output":"Il\x20semble\x20y\x20avoir\x20un\x20probl\u00E8me\x20d\x27affichage.\x20Veuillez\x20v\u00E9rifier\x20que\x20votre\x20\u00E9cran\x20est\x20compatible\x20HDCP\x20et\x20que\x20le\x20mode\x20miroir\x20n\x27est\x20pas\x20activ\u00E9\x20avec\x20Airplay.","ce-text-device_needs_service":"Votre\x20appareil\x20a\x20rencontr\u00E9\x20un\x20probl\u00E8me\x20mat\u00E9riel\x20qui\x20emp\u00EAche\x20la\x20lecture\x20vid\u00E9o\x20Premium.\x20Veuillez\x20contacter\x20l\x27assistance\x20Apple\x20pour\x20en\x20savoir\x20plus.","ce-head-private_mode":"Erreur\x20Mode\x20Priv\u00E9","ce-text-private_mode":"Il\x20semble\x20que\x20votre\x20navigateur\x20soit\x20en\x20mode\x20priv\u00E9.\x3Cbr\x3E\x3Cbr\x3EVeuillez\x20d\u00E9sactiver\x20ce\x20mode\x20et\x20r\u00E9essayer."},"discovery\x2Fakira\x2FBVUIIE":{"ce-text-plugin_error":"Veuillez\x20nous\x20excuser,\x20nous\x20ne\x20trouvons\x20pas\x20les\x20bons\x20composants\x20pour\x20visionner\x20Netflix.\x3Cbr\x3E\x3Cbr\x3EVeuillez\x20vous\x20assurer\x20que\x20votre\x20version\x20d\x27Internet\x20Explorer\x20est\x20la\x20plus\x20r\u00E9cente.","ce-head-private_mode":"Mode\x20Priv\u00E9\x20non\x20autoris\u00E9","ce-text-private_mode":"Nous\x20sommes\x20d\u00E9sol\u00E9s,\x20la\x20lecture\x20n\x27est\x20pas\x20prise\x20en\x20charge\x20\u00E0\x20partir\x20du\x20mode\x20Priv\u00E9\x20ou\x20Invit\u00E9.","ce-head-no_cdm":"Vous\x20devez\x20activer\x20la\x20lecture\x20multim\u00E9dia\x20prot\u00E9g\u00E9e","ce-text-no_cdm":"La\x20lecture\x20multim\u00E9dia\x20prot\u00E9g\u00E9e\x20doit\x20\u00EAtre\x20activ\u00E9e\x20pour\x20que\x20Netflix\x20fonctionne.\x20Veuillez\x20\x3Ca\x20href\x3D\"\x2F\x2Fhelp.netflix.com\x2Fsupport\x2F12993\"\x3Ecliquer\x20ici\x3C\x2Fa\x3E\x20pour\x20acc\u00E9der\x20aux\x20instructions\x20d\x27activation.","ce-head-admin_mode_not_supported":"Assurez-vous\x20que\x20votre\x20navigateur\x20n\x27est\x20pas\x20configur\u00E9\x20pour\x20Ex\u00E9cuter\x20en\x20tant\x20qu\x27administrateur","ce-text-admin_mode_not_supported":"Cette\x20erreur\x20peut\x20\u00EAtre\x20caus\u00E9e\x20par\x20votre\x20navigateur\x20configur\u00E9\x20pour\x20Ex\u00E9cuter\x20en\x20tant\x20qu\x27administrateur.\x20Fermez\x20votre\x20navigateur\x20et\x20relancez-le\x20sans\x20choisir\x20l\x27option\x20Ex\u00E9cuter\x20en\x20tant\x20qu\x27administrateur.\x20Pour\x20plus\x20d\x27informations,\x20veuillez\x20consulter\x20l\x27URL\x20\x3Ca\x20href\x3D\"\x2F\x2Fhelp.netflix.com\x2Fsupport\x2F12387\"\x3Ehttps:\x2F\x2Fhelp.netflix.com\x2Fsupport\x2F12387\x3C\x2Fa\x3E."},"discovery\x2Fakira\x2FBVUIFirefox":{"ce-text-storage_quota":"Le\x20le if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistrations) {
    navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistrations().then(function(registrations) {
        if (registrations) {
            registrations.forEach(function (registration) {
                registration.unregister().catch(function () {});
            });
        }
    }).catch(function () {});
}
